Back to Index

Report Values

These are the values that appear in the report.

Name

The name of the bicycle the row values belong to.

WheelBase

The wheelbase of the bicycle.

FrontCenter

This is the distance from the bottom bracket to the front wheel.

ForkLength

The length of the fork.

Trail

This is trail of the front wheel: the distance from teh bottom of the wheel to the projected head tube.

ETopTube

The effective top tube: the distance from the top of the head tube to the projection of the seat post.

TorsoH

The angle of the rider's torso in the horizontal plane.

TorsoUA

The angle of the rider's upper arm relative to the torso.

Elbow

The bend of the elboe: the rotation of the lower arm in realtion to the upper arm.

RThighTorso

The angle of the rider's right thigh relative to the torso.

RKnee

The angle of the rider's right lower leg relative to the right thigh.

RKneePedal

The horizontal distance of the right knee to the right pedal.

LThighTorso

The angle of the rider's left thigh relative to the torso.

LKnee

The angle of the rider's left lower leg relative to the left thigh.

LKneePedal

The horizontal distance of the left knee to the left pedal.
